page.title: 01General Review East: FINTRY
page.content:
The area which people, who live here, think of as Fintry, covers 4 squares of this Domesday Survey. See also:
{ 02600687, 02600684, 02560687
This is an area of hill farming and forestry. A peaceful and isolated area yet within thirty minutes driving from Glasgow. There is also a reservoir.
The two roads lead out of the village to the east and south. The latter, one of Scotland's highest passes, is much used by those who work in Glasgow. {There may be no traffic lights, but {watch out for low cloud and sheep.
At times snow blocked in winter, when skiers come into their own, in summer, there is much gentle hill walking for those who respect the countryside.
